Key Match Events: Kerry Carpenter hit a three-run home run in the ninth off All-Star closer Emmanuel Clase for a 3-0 victory
Pre-Game Insights: Detroit Tigers play the Cleveland Guardians on Wednesday with their best-of-five AL Division Series tied at one game apiece
Tigers president of baseball operations Scott Harris said the fans will be loud from the very first pitch
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch plans to use many pitchers for an inning or so Wednesday as he has twice in the playoffs and in a slew of games in the regular season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Motor City has not hosted a playoff baseball game in a decade
The Detroit Tigers play the Cleveland Guardians on Wednesday with their best-of-five AL Division Series tied at one game apiece, ending a drought that has dragged on since 2014
Others: Alex Cobb last appeared in the playoffs in 2013 and made his season debut Aug. 9, then was sidelined after two games by a torn nail on his right index finger
The 2023 All-Star made his season debut Aug. 9 and was sidelined after two games by a torn nail on his right index finger
Cobb said he prepped for the playoffs with a pair of simulated games
